message:
SYSTEM: 4._methodologies-Espec-OL.pdf: Página 39
Ontological Engineering 
©Asunción Gómez-Pérez,
Card Sorting. Collect and organise the concepts
• Write down each concept/idea on a card
• Organise them into piles
• Link the piles together
• Do it again, and again
• Example. Create an ontology for an index of a children’s 
book of animals including 
– Where they live
– What they eat
•
Carnivores, herbivores and omnivores
– How dangerous they are
– How big they are
– A bit of basic anatomy
•
numbers of legs, wings, toes, etc.
speaker: SYSTEM
